title: Ticket #2338: Unit tests for IPv6
description: The IPv6 work needs a bunch of unit tests. Many of the lower level calls and objects can be tested independently: are link local and loopback addresses detected correctly? Are IPv4 and IPv6 addresses parsed correctly? Do invalid addresses generate errors?
remarks:

See #2526, instead.
